document_data.name: Hall of the Open Book
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of the Open Book''' was the guildhall of the [[Lorekeepers' Alliance]] that operated in the city of [[Myth Drannor]] ''circa'' the 7{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It was located on the [[Street of Song]] just east of Sixstar, the junction of six major city roads in the city's [[Myth Drannor/Kerradunath|Kerradunath]] district.
document_data.Interior: The bottom floor of the hall comprised a library and an area dedicated to the inscription and copying of manuscripts. The second floor housed the offices of the Lorekeepers' Alliance and an area for book-binding.
document_data.Services: The hall's services could be utilized by members of the guild or offered to their clientele, for a price of course.
